docs.snippet: With the latest developer vowing to open by 2017 with a host of eye-popping features, work is once again proceeding on the languishing New Jersey mega-project now known as American Dream Meadowlands....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the latest developer vowing to open by 2017 with a host of eye-popping features, work is once again proceeding on the languishing New Jersey mega-project now known as American Dream Meadowlands.
docs.abstract: Ghermezian family's Triple Five Group, owner of two of America's largest malls, has taken over giant shopping mall project at New Jersey's Meadowlands, stalled for six years, and renamed it American Dream Meadowlands; some caution $5 billion project may not be financially viable.

headline.main: Huge Mall Rising at Troubled Site in North Jersey
headline.print_headline: Huge Mall Rising at Troubled Site in North Jersey
